title: Kevin Hart Interview and more
itunes:title: Kevin Hart Interview and more
description:
Thursday 12/14- Today on the show we had Kevin Hart stop by, and knowing "The Breakfast Club" they got straight to the point, with the first question being about the cheating scandal; and lets just say Kevin was an open book to all of the questions. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Charles Barkley after his comments towards Lavar Ball and Angela Yee helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 12/14- Today on the show we had Kevin Hart stop by, and knowing "The Breakfast Club" they got straight to the point, with the first question being about the cheating scandal; and lets just say Kevin was an open book to all of the questions. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Charles Barkley after his comments towards Lavar Ball and Angela Yee helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
